title: Creating and Implementing an Enforcement Response to the Foreclosure Crisis
content: For release on delivery  12:40 p.m. EST  January 7, 2012      Creating and Implementing an Enforcement Response to the Foreclosure Crisis         Remarks by     Sarah Bloom Raskin     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Association of American Law Schools     Washington, DC                 January 7, 2012
